talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Princess Zelda has given the order!<sp:5:0:0> So,
here we go, Sango!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>It won't be scary if we both go together,
all at once! On the count of three...<sp:5:1:0>
One...<sp:5:1:0>two...<sp:5:1:0>three!
...<sp:5:1:0>
talk0068:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Ease>What...<sp:5:1:0> Oh, <sp:5:0:0>it's one of us. Just another
survey-team member.

Sorry. I thought you were a <clr:0000>monster<clr:ffff>.
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Ease>What...<sp:5:1:0> Oh, it's...<sp:5:0:0>you. I thought it was 
a <clr:0000>monster<clr:ffff>.
talk0069:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Ease>Oh, just you again.<sp:5:0:0> Sorry, I was sure you
were a monster this time.
talk0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wait, are you serious?!<sp:5:1:0> You're in your
underpants, so you look prepared to
take this on.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But we'll hold on to <clr:0000>any gear you have<clr:ffff>,
all right?
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We're trying to conduct research on the
<clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>holed up in this cave.

But look at us.<sp:5:0:0> We're hardly geared up
to deal with any threats.

We can't bring ourselves to go in there.
Our research is...<sp:5:0:0>at a standstill.
talk0072:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now then, <sp:5:0:0>I'll hold on to any equipment
you may have!
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Princess Zelda sent out very specific
directions for us on the survey team, and
it's this, word for word...
"We will only find our future if we chart
a new course, leaving the safety of
indoor study for exploration in the wild.
"So, prepare your mind and body, and
then explore in underpants!"

I know Princess Zelda wants us to do it
this way. But we're really only members
of the survey team.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's scary enough to deal with monsters
with equipment. But...without any?
talk0073:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh...<sp:5:1:0> You must be a new survey-team
member, if you're dressed like us.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>There are <clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>holed up in this cave.<sp:5:1:0>
Sorry. This place is off-limits for now.
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>*sigh*<sp:5:1:0> If only someone could do this,
show us how it's done... Well, then we
could try to do it without gear too.
talk0074:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We'll handle defeating the monsters!


That way, you can keep doing your best
work in your underpants without fear!
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>All right, Sango! Let's try it again—in the
name of superior research!
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Are you serious?!


<sp:3:0:2:0101>You'll need to go in<clr:0000> wearing as little as
we are<clr:ffff>. You're sure about this?
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That's...<sp:5:0:0>disappointing. But if you don't
want to do it, I guess that's just how
it goes.
I hoped you'd show us how it's supposed
to be done. It'd be inspiring!
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now then, <sp:5:0:0>I'll hold on to your other
clothes and any equipment you may have!
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Just give me a shout when you want your
equipment back!
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We'll hold back and learn your methods
from a distance. We're...<sp:5:0:0>just not confident
in the whole physical side of this.
talk0081:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>They went to look into a <clr:0000>monster den <clr:ffff>up
this mountain road—and haven't come
back yet.
talk0082:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>This spot used to see a lot of travelers
coming through here on their way to
Goron City.
But they're mostly taking a new road now.
So monsters have been making their home
in the area.
I've been telling folks that it's too
dangerous around here to walk around
in just their underpants.
They won't listen to me though.
They insist they're following Princess
Zelda's orders.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've also heard that some of these
under-dressed men have set off to
explore a place near here.
talk0084:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy_01>Working in just your underpants...can
sound difficult, I know...
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well then,<sp:5:0:0> let me return the equipment
I was holding for you. Give us a shout if
you change your mind!
talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?!<sp:5:0:0> You really defeated the monsters
wearing only your underpants?

<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm going to tell the other members of the
team about your stunning work here.

Please, join us back at Foothill Stable!
talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>OK then,<sp:5:0:0> I'll return the gear that I was
holding for you.
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We'll head back to <clr:0000>Foothill Stable <clr:ffff>and
wait for you there!
talk0088:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>We'll step into the den for sure this time,
Drant! One...<sp:5:0:0>two...<sp:5:0:0>three!<sp:5:1:0>
talk0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired>*huff* *huff*<sp:5:1:0> Phew! H-hello there,
traveler...

You have an interest in the...<sp:5:0:0>brilliant
guidance of...<sp:5:0:0>Princess Zelda too?
talk0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Incredible! Please, tell us how this is
actually done!
talk0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired>*huff* *huff*<sp:5:1:0> Phew! Good morning,
traveler...

You have an interest in the...<sp:5:0:0>brilliant
guidance of...<sp:5:0:0>Princess Zelda too?
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Um...<sp:5:1:0> Excuse me.<sp:5:0:0>


What's all this with wearing only
<clr:0000>underpants<clr:ffff>?
talk0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired>*huff* *huff*<sp:5:1:0> Phew! Good evening,
traveler...

You have an interest in the...<sp:5:0:0>brilliant
guidance of...<sp:5:0:0>Princess Zelda too?
talk0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh, sorry!<sp:5:1:0> I guess you haven't heard
Princess Zelda's order for all of us on
the survey team yet.
She said we had to leave the comfort
of studying indoors. She ended with
these words...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"So, prepare your mind and body, and
then <clr:0000>explore in underpants<clr:ffff>!"
talk0103:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired>*huff* *huff*<sp:5:1:0> Hello... So, given you're
dressed in our new uniform, you must
be a new member of our survey team.
talk0093:
Have you decided not to show us the
superior skill of fending off threats in
only your underpants?
talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>No, I got the order too.<sp:5:0:0> That's why I'm
all the way out here doing research.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But what Princess Zelda REALLY said
was this...

"So, prepare your mind and body, and
then<clr:0000> explore all other paths<clr:ffff>!"

Not...<sp:5:0:0>what you guys thought.
talk0095:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Why not join our efforts here?


Our survey work has never felt more
adventurous than in our underpants!
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Then all this time we've spent doing
our survey research in our underpants
was...<sp:5:0:0>a total waste of time?
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There you are, partner!<sp:5:0:0> Have you seen all
the <clr:0000>men in underpants<clr:ffff> at the stable?
talk0106:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've heard...<sp:5:1:0>that some of these
under-dressed men have set off to
explore a place near here.
talk0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Well, not entirely... 


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Princess Zelda did say to strengthen our
<clr:0000>mind and body<clr:ffff>, and to go outside to push
ourselves. To excel like never before!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've been listening to the chirps and
warbles from my sources.

They said that <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> ordered 
all the members of the Zonai Survey
Team here to dress that way.
talk0097:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>OK. Dangerous research happening here.
Please, stand back.
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Uh-huh. I see...<sp:5:1:0> So, the chirps and
warbles that started us off here really
paid off in the end. What a story!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The team here botched the listening part
and went overboard with the doing part.
Still, that's commitment!
Well, one thing's for sure. Princess Zelda
really is a top-notch leader. What a
powerful inspiration she is!
talk0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>With that, I'll take wing. This story isn't
going to write itself, after all!
talk0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Everyone! This is the one who did our
survey team a great service, defeating
the monsters in just his underpants.
talk0099:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Is that not the spirit of what we were
trying to do?<sp:5:1:0> Our methods as researchers
have been truly tested!
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Come on! Let's return to our work and
keep this high standard forever!
talk0053: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>Hey, traveler! The cave isn't over there!
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy_01>Hah!<sp:5:0:0> Haaah!<sp:5:0:0> From now on, we of the
survey team must pursue excellence on
two fronts at once! <sp:5:0:0>Mind and body!
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Princess<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zelda<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>in all her brilliance...<sp:5:0:0>
has given us our marching <clr:0000>orders<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0> We
must live up to her expectations!
talk0057:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I couldn't help noticing, partner...<sp:5:0:0> The
way you're dressed...<sp:5:1:0>are you planning to
investigate these fellows undercover?
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, that could be a smart way to get
the real story from those men. That
takes some guts, kid.
talk0009:
The order she gave to the survey team
was this, word for word...

<sp:3:0:2:0700>"We will only find our future if we chart
a new course, leaving the safety of
indoor study for exploration in the wild.
"So, prepare your mind and body, and
then <clr:0000>explore in underpants<clr:ffff>!"

And, traveler, I will tell you, when
Princess Zelda gave our team those
marching orders...<sp:5:0:0>we marched!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So, that's why we're here, surveying
monsters in our underpants.
talk0058:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Ease>Phew!<sp:5:1:0> That was close...<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0700>This cave is <clr:0000>a dangerous place<clr:ffff>, so please
don't get close!
talk0059:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh...<sp:5:1:0>a traveler.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>There are <clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>holed up in this cave.<sp:5:1:0>
Sorry. This place is off-limits for now.
talk0060:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We've been asked to survey and defeat
the monsters.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But, er...<sp:5:1:0> Pay no mind to our, hmm,
official uniforms here.
talk0061:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Why would Princess Zelda give such a
reckless order to the survey team?<sp:5:1:0>

These chirps and warbles are going to
give us a real story to report on...<sp:5:0:0>
I just know it.
talk0063:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>You must have heard <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>'s<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
order, which was this, word for word...<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0700>"We will only find our future if we chart
a new course, leaving the safety of
indoor study for exploration in the wild.
"So, prepare your mind and body, and
then <clr:0000>explore in underpants<clr:ffff>!"

Take the princess's order to heart. Push
your brains and brawn to the limit. Your
investigation will exceed expectations!
